## Prerequisite

[aqua](https://aquaproj.github.io/): tool to manage cli 

Install:

```
brew install aquaproj/aqua/aqua
```

[tfcmt](https://suzuki-shunsuke.github.io/tfcmt/)

```
aqua g -i suzuki-shunsuke/tfcmt
```
